title: Biden’s Moderna Vaccine Double-Cross
sub_head: Officials thank the biotech startup for saving lives by making it a political scapegoat.
body:
Most Americans had never heard of Moderna until the pandemic. In less than a year, the biotech startup produced the world’s most effective Covid vaccine—exemplifying U.S. leadership in scientific innovation. Now the Biden Administration is showing its gratitude by stabbing the company in the back.
Even by Washington norms, the Administration’s double-cross is remarkable. Biden officials in recent weeks have been leaking to the media that they are very unhappy with Moderna for allegedly putting profits over vaccinating the world’s poor.
